text: Md. Julfiker Murtuja Chowdhury is a Bangladesh Nationalist Party politician and the former Member of Parliament of Thakurgaon-2. ==Career== Zulfiqar was elected to parliament from Thakurgaon-2 as a Bangladesh Nationalist Party candidate in 15 February 1996 Bangladeshi general election. He was defeated from Thakurgaon-2 constituency on 12 June 1996 on the nomination of Bangladesh Nationalist Party. He submitted his nomination papers for the Eleventh Parliamentary Election of 2019 and later withdrew them. ==References== Category:Bangladesh Nationalist Party politicians Category:Living people Category:6th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Md. Julfiker Murtuja Chowdhury
